    • Constructor Detail

      • SpenUnderlineSpan

        public SpenUnderlineSpan()
        Creates an SpenUnderlineSpan instance.
        Since:
        4.0.0

      • SpenUnderlineSpan

        public SpenUnderlineSpan(int startPosition,
                         int endPosition,
                         int expansionType,
                         boolean isUnderline)
        Creates an SpenItalicSpan instance with the span properties.
        Parameters:
        startPosition - The start position of span. The position should not be negative number. The negative number will be ignored.
        endPosition - The end position of span. The position should not be negative number. The negative number will be ignored.
        expansionType - The expansion type of span.
        isUnderline - Enable underline type or not.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the endPosition is smaller than the startPosition. If the expansionType is negative or lager than the SpenTextSpanBase.SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_INCLUSIVE.
        Since:
        4.0.0
